author: Laura Hoy
title: U.S. Has the Most Coronavirus Cases in the World, But Donald Trump Still Won’t Act
description: Without drastic action from Donald Trump, coronavirus cases in the U.S. will continue to rise at an uncontrollable rate. The post U.S. Has the Most Coronavirus Cases in the World, But Donald Trump Still Won’t Act appeared first on CCN.com
content:
• The U.S. officially has the most coronavirus cases in the world, surpassing China and Italy.
  • Donald Trump still refuses to accept the severity of the virus and allowed it to spread across the U.S.
